channel.title: Turbo FM I - VROOOM - Game Over
channel.description:
# VROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM
**Rules** Don't cheat, don't gamethrow, Ici is a bagel.
**Mechanics**
10 miniute days, 5 miniute nights. Day One is full length with a lynch. Lynch is decided by plurality at the end of the day. Tied Votes = Nolynch. Mafia do not have daychat. Mafia must decide on a player to do the nightkill for the purpose of Jailkeeper. Role PMs only contain rolename. Mafia will share a single role PM to give them a private thread.
**Rolelist**
[color=green]**1 Cop 8 Citizens**[/color] [color=red]**2 Mafia Goons**[/color] Look up what they each do.
**Signups** Game will start at 5PM GMT on either today if things go quickly or on Monday if sign-ups do not fill quickly.
2. Methnor 3. Orangeandblack5 4. Wolfy 5. Strangle 6. PokemonKidRyan 8. Hippolytus 9. Moleland
